content.name: St. Mary's Hospital - West Wing Expansion
content.description: Construction of a new 4-story wing for the cardiology department, including underground parking structure.

associatedOpportunities.description: CAT D8T Dozer for foundation excavation
Crane service with operator for steel erection

notes.content: Strict noise ordinances after 6 PM. All equipment must be shut down by 5:45 PM to allow for proper wind-down.
Badging required for site access. All personnel must check in at the security trailer before entering the construction zone.
Hard hats and steel-toed boots mandatory at all times. High-visibility vests required in active construction areas.
Hospital loading dock available for equipment deliveries on Tuesdays and Thursdays only.

activities.description: Initial site walkthrough with project manager
Quarterly review meeting with Turner Construction

content.name: Riverfront Stadium Renovation
content.description: Complete resurfacing of playing field and installation of new structural seating.

associatedOpportunities.description: Annual preventive maintenance on fleet excavators

notes.content: Stadium will remain operational during renovation. Work must be scheduled around game days and events.
All workers must complete crowd safety training before accessing field areas.
Background checks required for all personnel due to public venue security protocols.

content.name: I-55 Highway Resurfacing (Mile Marker 20-35)
content.description: Night work only. Asphalt removal and resurfacing of southbound lanes.

associatedOpportunities.description: Purchase of new CAT AP655F Asphalt Paver
Paving crew with roller equipment for ramp sections
Drum assembly and wear plates for roller fleet

notes.content: Safety vest required at all times. All personnel must wear high-visibility vests when on or near the roadway.
Deliveries must be scheduled between 10 PM and 4 AM due to lane closure restrictions.
IDOT inspector will be on-site every night. All work must meet state highway standards.
Emergency vehicle access lane must be maintained at all times during night work operations.

activities.description: Confirmed delivery schedule for paving equipment

content.name: Fox Valley Mall - Landscaping Refurbishment
content.description: Updating exterior landscaping, tree removal, and new retaining walls.

associatedOpportunities.description: 3-month rental of mini excavator for utility work
Purchase of Bobcat T770 Compact Track Loader

notes.content: Project completed successfully. All equipment returned and inspected.
Final safety inspection passed with no incidents recorded during project.

content.name: Amazon Fulfillment Center #ORD5
content.description: Ground-up construction of 800,000 sq ft distribution warehouse.

associatedOpportunities.description: Replacement filters and belts for generator fleet

notes.content: Security clearance required for all deliveries. Drivers must present valid ID and be on the approved vendor list.
All equipment must be delivered to Gate 3. No exceptions - Gate 1 and 2 are for personnel only.
Site requires OSHA 30 certification for all operators. Verify credentials before dispatching personnel.
Amazon sustainability requirements: all diesel equipment must meet Tier 4 emissions standards.
Weekly safety meetings held every Monday at 7:00 AM in the main trailer. Attendance is mandatory.

activities.description: Weekly progress meeting with Amazon construction team

content.name: City Water Treatment Plant Upgrade
content.description: Installation of new filtration pumps and backup power systems.

associatedOpportunities.description: Purchase of CAT 3512B Generator Set for backup power
Preventive maintenance on existing pump station motors
Temp power with operator for filtration building
Purchase of replacement filtration valves and actuators
Portable pump rental for dewatering operations
Drill bit and tooling replacement package
Purchase of backup generator for pump station

notes.content: Critical infrastructure site - 24/7 operations must be maintained. No scheduled outages without 72-hour advance notice.
Confined space entry permits required for all tank and pump room work. Contact site safety officer before entry.
Municipal security protocols in effect. All visitors must sign in at guard station and display visitor badges.

content.name: Willow Creek Residential Subdivision
content.description: Phase 2 development: Grading and utility installation for 50 new single-family homes.

notes.content: Heavy clay soil conditions reported. Recommend track-type equipment over wheeled machines for better flotation.
Residential area - strict noise ordinances. No heavy equipment operation before 7 AM or after 7 PM.
School bus route runs through site entrance. Extra caution required during morning and afternoon school hours.

content.name: Downtown Bridge Rehabilitation
content.description: Structural steel repairs and repainting of the main street bridge.

associatedOpportunities.description: Supply of C7 Industrial Engine parts
Structural steel inspection and weld repair

notes.content: Work barge required for under-bridge access. Barge must be secured at night to prevent drift.
Fall protection required for all work over water. Personal flotation devices must be worn at all times.
Bridge remains open to traffic during construction. Work zones must be clearly marked with proper signage.

content.name: University Tech Park - Incubator Building
content.description: New 3-story mixed-use office and lab space.

associatedOpportunities.description: Boom lift with operator for facade work
Concrete forms and accessories for foundation

notes.content: Awaiting final funding approval. Project timeline contingent on state grant disbursement expected Q3 2025.
University lab safety protocols will apply. All contractors must complete online safety orientation before site access.

content.name: Limestone Quarry - South Face Expansion
content.description: Stripping overburden to access new aggregate veins.

associatedOpportunities.description: 24-month lease of Komatsu WA380 wheel loader

notes.content: Mandatory MSHA training for all site visitors. Part 46 or Part 48 certification required depending on role.
Blasting operations occur daily at 2:00 PM. All personnel must clear blast zone 30 minutes prior.
Dust suppression required per EPA permit conditions. Water trucks must operate during all crushing activities.
Quarry security is active 24/7. After-hours access requires advance coordination with quarry manager.

activities.description: Quarterly review with quarry operations team
